## EthersKumo.getUniTokenAllowance() method

Get the liquidity mining contract's allowance of a holder's Uniswap ETH/KUSD LP tokens.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getUniTokenAllowance(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | _(Optional)_ Address holding the Uniswap ETH/KUSD LP tokens. |
|  overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt;
